name: 蕭耀榮
objective: 熟悉古典控制、線性空間分析，狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性，穩定性分析，狀態回授及估測，控制器設計及應用，觀測器設計及應用，非線性系統，時變系統，控制理論的應用
schedule:

2　　Review of Time response, stability
3　　Review of Root Locus and Controller Design
4　　Review of Frequency Response and Controller Design
5　　Review of Frequency Response and Controller Design
6　　equation modeling and linearization
7　　state space representation
8　　dynamics of linear system
9　　midterm exam / initial project due
10　　system controllability
11　　system observability
12　　system stability
13　　state feedback
14　　state estimator
15　　reduced-order observer
16　　controller design / final project due
17　　optimal control / Linear quadratic regulator / Kalman filter
18　　Final exam
